thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com
thread.title: Carroll
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Carroll

author: Carroll
title: Carroll
text: Last Saturday, I called Auto Europe to begin initial planning for a family trip to Europe. I happened to have my call answered by Leo. He could not have been more knowledgeable or helpful. Leo obviously was interested in providing the best customer service possible, and he did. I just may put his extension on speed dial!
